Write-Up Text: The Australian budget has made waves in the country's social media landscape as people share their thoughts and opinions on the latest policies. Politicians strategized their one-liners while others shared their dissent towards the budget. Meanwhile some expressed confusion about the proposed rent freeze. The agriculture and coach industries had mixed reactions on the budget with incentives and rising taxes. Overall the budget wasn't celebrating a feast among comments but people had different interpretations on what each policy could mean.
